entry.title: 60"x126" Hunter Emerald Green Satin Rectangular Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2252
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 5.99 - 198.39 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Material: Satin
Color: Hunter Emerald Green
Size: 60"x126" 
Thickness: 135 GSM
1 Piece, Seamless Design
Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
Stain and Wrinkle resistant
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Silky Smooth Satin Tablecloth

Silky, smooth, and shiny satin always inspires people; there is an overwhelming charm and sophistication that this imperial fabric exudes. This attribute makes it a number one choice for decoration, embellishing and ornamenting. Our supreme quality Satin Tablecloths are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind table linen for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Royal Look & Effect

Spread these shimmering sheets atop your drab tables and plain table tops to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe of such a festal decoration. Oozing royal feel and luster, our Satin Tablecloths are ideal to give your plain tables and tablescapes a quick glamorous twist. Elevate the elegance of your tables manifold at wedding, birthday, holiday dinner, Christmas feast, and special events  by draping with these lush spreads.

     

Premium Quality

Dress your tables to the nines with our durable, reusable and totally adorable Satin Tablecloths that will give your guests an instant esteemed feel and royal treatment during your event. Fashioned from premium quality silky satin, these tablecloths can be used again and again to spruce your tables up without losing their regal luster and seamless sheen.


Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Satin
  • Color: Hunter Emerald Green
  • Size: 60"x126"
  • Thickness: 135 GSM
  • 1 Piece, Seamless Design
  • Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
  • Stain and Wrinkle resistant
  • How to Care: Machine washable with Cold water
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

Color: Purple

[Information]

Satin ribbons are coveted for their impeccable sheen and shiny luster. Our shiny and silky satin ribbons are perfect for gift wrapping, personalized wedding tags, veils, crafting etc. Glossy satin ribbons are the ribbons of choice for weddings and other festive occasions. Their silky, glossy surface makes them simply irresistible. Our ribbon spool has an appealing elegance that will impart a regal feel to whatever you adorn with it. Titivate your simple gifts by crafting elegant bows on wrapped gifts and packages, wedding bouquets and parcel baskets, embellish your scrap book pages and apparels or simply accentuate your home decor items with these shimmering satin ribbons available in a great range of colors and sizes.

Additional Information:

  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Birthday, Events, Gift, Favors, DIY, Decoration

entry.title: 54"x4 Yards Red Mini Rosette Multi Color Fabric Bolt
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_5210
Type: Fabrics
Price: 27.69

[About]

Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
Material: High Quality Satin (Crafted into Numerous Large Side by Side Roses)
Width of Fabric: 54" Wide
Length of Fabric: 4 Yards
Color: Red 
Edges: Not Finished
These fabric bolts are perfect for draping tables, ceilings, walls, and can also be used to fuel your own creativity
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

Roses are rejoicing, revitalizing and of course romantic! They express and portray our feelings and emotions more vividly than words and writings. Celebration looks incomplete without flowers and once you fuse a floral ingredient into a festive mood, the outcome is simply ecstatic. Same is the case with our enchanting mini rosette fabric bolt that has that extra lure and charm as that of an elite ballroom. With silky satin mini roses brilliantly hand rolled throughout the premium quality Mini Rosette Multi Color Fabric Bolt in three most stunning complementing shades, we present to you our most exquisite and exotic masterpiece, The ballroom Mini Rosette Fabric Bolt. Design swanky apparels to make people swoon over at your loveliness, or swathe your event from top to bottom to transform it into a paradise rose garden.

Additional Information:

  • Material: High Quality Satin (Crafted into Numerous Large Side by Side Roses)
  • Width of Fabric: 54" Wide 
  • Length of Fabric: 4 Yards 
  • Color: Red 
  • Qty: 1 Bolt/Order
  • Edges: Not Finished.
  • These fabric bolts are perfect for draping tables, ceilings, walls, and can also be used to fuel your own creativity.

Width: 1/16" Wide
Color: Burgundy
Perfect for crafting, working with flowers, or general decoration
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

Satin ribbons are coveted for their impeccable sheen and shiny luster. Our shiny and silky single sides satin ribbons are perfect for gift wrapping, personalized wedding tags, veils, crafting etc. Glossy satin ribbons are the ribbons of choice for weddings and other festive occasions. Their silky, glossy surface makes them simply irresistible. Our ribbon spool has an appealing elegance that will impart a regal feel to whatever you adorn with it. Titivate your simple gifts by crafting elegant bows on wrapped gifts and packages, wedding bouquets and parcel baskets, embellish your scrap book pages and apparels or simply accentuate your home decor items with these shimmering satin ribbons available in a great range of colors and sizes.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Glossy Satin Style Ribbons.
  • Length: 100 Yards ( 300Ft ) per Spool
  • Width: 1/16" Wide
  • Color: Burgundy
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Birthday, Events, Gift, Favors, DIY, Decoration

Add a touch of class and elite grace into your tabletops with our silky smooth satin napkins. The impeccable sheen and velvety luster of premium quality satin will exude oodles of sparkle and sophistication to your tablescape. Fold them modishly in different shapes complementing your tableware, or simply display in classic rectangular fold to give a VIP feel to your treasured guests. Our upscale quality Satin napkins are perfect to use in weddings, banquets, bars, hotels, resorts, cruise lines and restaurants.

Additional Information:

  • How To Care: Dry Clean Only
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Tableware
